scripts.dev: export DB_NAME=mysql_project_db && npm run mysql && nodemon index.js
scripts.mysql: npm run mysql:restart && npm run mysql:check
scripts.mysql:restart: npm run mysql:stop; npm run mysql:start
scripts.mysql:start:log: export DB_NAME=mysql_project_db export FLAG=-it && npm run mysql:run
scripts.mysql:run: docker run $FLAG --rm -p 3306:3306 -v $(pwd)/schema:/docker-entrypoint-initdb.d --name=mysql-sandbox -e MYSQL_ALLOW_EMPTY_PASSWORD=root -e MYSQL_DATABASE=$DB_NAME mysql:8 mysqld --authentication_policy=mysql_native_password
scripts.mysql:check: until docker exec mysql-sandbox mysql -e "use $DB_NAME; show tables;"; do echo ...; sleep 1; done && sleep 3
